name: Platinum Huckleberry Cookies
description: Platinum Huckleberry Cookies by Dynasty Seeds is a labor of love that began in 2014. This strain crosses a potent Platinum Girl Scout Cookies mother plant and Dynastyâ€™s own Oregon Huckleberry father. The hybrid of these two strains offers growers higher yields, better internodal spacing, and a complexity of flavor few strains achieve. Its aroma is sour berries and mint while the flavor is hashy and floral. Platinum Huckleberry Cookies stimulates the mind with a rush of euphoria and crests into a full-body couchlock.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Happy, Tingly, Creative, Stress, Pain, Depression, Fatigue, Inflammation, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes
